Welcome to

Noire restaurant

At Noire, we strive to elevate modern fine dining to unprecedented levels. Precision, creativity, and seasonal ingredients come together to create an elevated and unforgettable culinary experience.

Book a table Open menu

Fine dining

Experience contemporary cuisine crafted with balance and bold expression. Our seasonal menu showcases refined techniques, exceptional flavours, and artfully presented dishes designed for the modern gastronome.

Open menu

Michelin stars standards

Enter an atmosphere of understated luxury and calm sophistication. From minimalist design to impeccable service, Noire delivers an intimate Michelin-starred dining experience at the highest level.

Book now

About Noire

Noire is a contemporary fine-dining alternative. We acquire food to achieve excellence and use modern techniques to avoid gimmicks. Each dish is created per course in complicated fashions that are simply presented for ingredient integrity. Our space is a blank canvas, clean and unadorned with little to no extras, and our service is seamlessly developed, boasting an environment of assured comfort, understated elegance, and increased exclusivity.

Read more about us

Why people choose us

John Mike

The entire experience was truly amazing. Everything was on point, inventive and balanced. Michelin Star worthy!

Mellisa Adam

It's modern fine dining at its best. Flavours pop, but they are not overwhelming. Presentation is impeccable. This is a restaurant that surpasses previous expectations.

Beth Stone

The experience is both elaborate and unpretentious. The restaurant offers flawless service, beautiful plates, and a calm, self-assured, and cutting-edge atmosphere.

Ben Smith

Noire is a go-to for modern dining, and with seasonal fare and a well-thought-out, smooth experience, it's one of my favourite restaurants.

Christina Isa

This was one of the most significant meals we've had all year. Each course had a story, and the attention to detail with everything was extraordinary.

George King

It's an elegant, modern space with precision and hospitality. Noire combines culinary strength with a meticulously designed space and invitingly professional service.
